original_title: BREQUE: Um olhar sobre a produtividade
overview: Breque observes the impact of two characters' expedients, and investigates how they develop their free time of choice. Another perspective is the testimony and analysis of a university professor on the impact of contemporaneity, the emergence of occupational diseases, self-demand, and the recognition resulting from work
title: BREQUE: Um olhar sobre a produtividade
